alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 1:49PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Burke, southeastern Richmond, west central Barnwell and south central Aiken Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 149 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Plant Vogtle, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Shell Bluff, Shell Bluff Landing and Bennock Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
